title: Good site for hi res clip art???
content:
Hello -- I am looking for a place to search for and buy hi res eps clip art illustrations on the web (for print use).   
   
Like the ArtRoom type of clip art --   
   
Anyone have any suggestions?
author: capital_m

comments.content:
\>_Like the ArtRoom type of clip art..._   
   
Carole, I used to work for Image Club and EyeWire. I have several 'lightly-used' copies of the ArtRoom, and other clip art CDs that I would be willing to sell out of my archives. Contact me directly and I'll let you know what I have available.
I miss parts of it too, but not the crappy corporate parts - the post-Getty parts. Feh.
